import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";const{white}=colors;const{borderWidth}=borders;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{color:"#9fc9ff",transition:"all 200ms linear","&.Mui-active":{color:white.main},"&.Mui-completed":{color:white.main}},alternativeLabel:{top:"14%",left:"-50%",right:"50%"},line:{borderWidth:"".concat(borderWidth[2]," !important"),borderColor:"currentColor",opacity:0.5}}};
